short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inbox King lets you automate messages on your PERSONAL FACEBOOK PROFILE without getting banned.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inbox King is a chat bot for your PERSONAL FACEBOOK PROFILE that lets you respond to incoming messages with automated pre-written responses.  Respond to incoming messages on Facebook automatically based on keywords.  Inbox King can help you convert more friends into customers while saving you time.  This PERSONAL FACEBOOK PROFILE chat bot is easy to setup and use.  Just install the chrome extension and type out your automated responses, and toggle the bot on.

For maximum success with Inbox King, be sure to include a question at the end of every reply you set up in the bot.  This way, your friends will continue to engage with the bot longer, and trigger even more keywords and responses.  You can also use the chat bot to send your friends links to your products and services. 

Get Inbox King today, and never worry about replying to messages ever again!
